page.title: 17TRADE SHOPS IN LUTON
page.content: Our area has many shops in Luton and in Caddington elsewhere there are few. In Luton there are lots of corner shops especially in the older parts. One pupil lives in a shop her father gets things to sell from a Luton Cash and Carry or from London. The shops sells mainly food but also some toys. It is open from 9am to 6.30pm and is part of the SPAR group. There is a small set of shops at the end of Dallow Rd which has been there for 15 years. On Farley Estate the shops are a little older, they are at Rockley Rd, Cross Ways and Whipperley Ring. The latter is the largest and is near a petrol station,a pub and the community centre. Most people go regularily to Luton's main shops, the Arndale, which is indoors. There is an indoor market, Debenhams department store, Sainsbury and Tesco supermarkets and a large car park.
